user: 会展中心总共有多少个厅
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting_rooms WHERE type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 总共有多少个厅
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rooms FROM meeting_rooms WHERE type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 会展中心一楼总共有多少个厅
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting_rooms WHERE floor = 1 AND (type = '独立会议室' OR type = '组合会议室')"}

user: 总共有多少个厅
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_halls FROM meeting_rooms WHERE type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 会展中心共有多少个房间？
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting_rooms WHERE type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 查看贵宾沙发
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM model WHERE name LIKE '%贵宾沙发%';"}

user: 查看贵宾沙发
call: {"query":"SELECT name, size_x, size_y, size_z FROM model WHERE name = '贵宾沙发';"}

user: 呃，会议中心一共有多少个会议厅？
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meeting_rooms FROM meeting_rooms WHERE type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 一共有多少家居？
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM model;"}

user: 呃，会议中心一共有多少种家具
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT name) FROM model;"}

user: 一共有多少种家具？
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) FROM model;"}

user: 查看贵宾沙发
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM model WHERE name LIKE '%贵宾沙发%';"}

user: 能承接2000人会议的会议室有哪些
call: {"query":"SELECT display_name FROM meeting_rooms WHERE capacity >= 2000 AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室')"}

user: 当前布局可以容纳多少人
call: {"query":"SELECT capacity FROM meeting_rooms WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%'"}

user: 能容纳2000人的房间有哪些
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, GROUP_CONCAT(display_name) AS rooms FROM meeting_rooms WHERE capacity >= 2000 AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 能容纳2000人的房间有多少个
call: {"query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM meeting_rooms WHERE capacity >= 2000 AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 宴会厅能容纳的最大人数
call: {"query":"SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM meeting_rooms WHERE type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 3层宴会厅能容纳的最大人数
call: {"query":"SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM meeting_rooms WHERE floor = 3 AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 峰会厅能容纳的最大人数
call: {"query":"SELECT capacity FROM meeting_rooms WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%' AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室');"}

user: 当前布局能容纳多少人
call: {"query":"SELECT capacity FROM meeting_rooms WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%'"}

user: 峰会厅能容纳的最大人数
call: {"query":"SELECT capacity FROM meeting_rooms WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%' AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室')"}

user: 能容纳3000人的会议厅有哪些
call: {"query":"SELECT display_name FROM meeting_rooms WHERE capacity >= 3000 AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室')"}

user: 峰会厅有多大面积
call: {"query":"SELECT display_name, dimension FROM meeting_rooms WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%' AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室')"}

user: 峰会厅有多大面积
call: {"query":"SELECT dimension FROM room WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%' AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室')"}

user: 峰会厅有多大面积
call: {"query":"SELECT display_name, dimension FROM room WHERE display_name LIKE '%峰会厅%' AND type IN ('独立会议室', '组合会议室')"}
